lemma hennessySim2: fixes \<Psi> :: 'b and P :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi" and Q :: "('a, 'b, 'c) psi" assumes PTrans: "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<longmapsto>\<tau> \<prec> P'" and P'RelQ: "(\<Psi>, P', Q) \<in> Rel" and C1: "\<And>\<Psi> P Q R. \<lbrakk>(\<Psi>, P, Q) \<in> Rel; \<Psi> \<rhd> Q \<sim> R\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> (\<Psi>, P, R) \<in> Rel" shows "\<Psi> \<rhd> P \<leadsto>\<guillemotleft>Rel\<guillemotright> \<tau>.(Q)"
